amendment.description: An amendment numbered 29 printed in Part A of House Report 118-147 to require the FAA to implement as a rule the recommendations issued by the aviation rulemaking committee for commercial passenger aircraft established by Sec. 522.
amendment.purpose: Amendment requires the Federal Aviation Administration, within 36 months, to install a secondary cockpit barrier on all commericial aircrafts.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fitzpatrick amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 392 - 41 (Roll no. 343).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Fitzpatrick.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Fitzpatrick amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 392 - 41 (Roll no. 343).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
